meanings.definition: A person or thing that eliminates or removes something
meanings.sent1: The janitor is the eliminator of trash in our school.
meanings.sent2: The vacuum cleaner is an efficient eliminator of dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand turned the eliminator of clutter into a cute little bunny.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the eliminator of all his worries, like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's cape billowed behind him as he stood tall, the eliminator of evil in the city.

meanings.definition: A game or competition in which participants are gradually eliminated until a winner is determined
meanings.sent1: The spelling bee is an eliminator where only the best speller wins.
meanings.sent2: The soccer tournament is an eliminator that determines the champion team.
meanings.sent3: The dance-off eliminator had everyone laughing with their funny moves.
meanings.sent4: The race was an eliminator, with each lap eliminating the slower runners.
meanings.sent5: The cooking competition was an intense eliminator, testing the chefs' skills to the limit.
